name: Cheesecake Workshop
description: This class is for all the cheescake lovers. Here at Flourish, we teach you a variety of cheesecakes that range with technique and flavour. Tips, tricks and methods pertaining to perfecting your cheesecake is covered in this class. A variety of 3 cheesecakes is taught.-Baked New York Cheesecake -Frozen Fruit Cheesecake -Cotton Cheesecake (Japanese Cheesecake) All information regarding the baking of these widely different cheesecake will be passed on to our students. We provide you with all the ingredients, tools and know-how for the class including a handout which you will be taking home. Along with that, you will be taking the lovely cheesecakes you've made at the class, back home to your friends and family. Join us for a fun filled, cheese-centric workshop! Cheers!

name: Food Nerd Festival - Immersives 2024 - Bangalore: All Day Pass
description: Food Nerd Festival is a celebration of all things food! So this festival is for anyone who’s obsessed with food! Whether you're a chef, foodie, flavour geek, or love to nerd out over the latest culinary trends and techniques, the Food Nerd Festival is your jam.With 4 workshops centred around the basic cooking elements, these immersives will leave you with an elevated culinary game.Salt by Chef Gautam & Bala (@gonzogarbanzo & @saltycuredpigs) (11-12:30)Guided Overview & History Of Preservation TechniquesExploring Techniques Of Pickling & Preserving In India & Around The WorldUnderstanding Curing Salts & The Science Behind ThemExpert Tips On Mastering Salt, Time, & FermentationLive Demonstration Of A Traditional Pickling TechniqueLive Demonstration Of A Meat Curing TechniqueRecipes For Pickling & Curing Bacon At HomeFat by Heena Punwani (@tiffintales, founder of Maska Bakery) (1:00-2:30)Cracking The Code Of Baking Theory: The Science Behind ItThe History Of Fats In CookingUnderstanding Different Fats In Indian BakingCookie Tasting Session Showcasing Different FatsOil Vs. Ghee: Flavor ShowdownLive Fat-Washing Cocktail DemoAcid by Payal Shah (@kobofermentery) (3:00-4:30)Exploring Indian Vinegars & Its Usage In Indian Cooking & HistoryLive Demonstration Of Vinegar Making.Breakdown Of The Science Behind The TechniqueA Vinegar-Tasting Experience of 5 vinegars.Hands-On Shrub-Based Drink MakingHeat by Chef Gresham Fernandes (@greshamfernandes) (5:00-6:30)Discover the Secrets of Heat SourcesUncover the chemistry behind how heat worksLearn the wonders of wood-fired cookingPro techniques for smoking foodUsing heat to create different textures: dry jerky vs fish roast. Disclaimer: Programming is subject to change, please watch out for an official email a few days before the actual workshop.

name: Roots of Resilience: Nurturing Mindfulness Through Gardening
description: Step into a calming space where nature and mindfulness come together in Roots of Resilience: Nurturing Mindfulness Through Gardening. This unique experience invites you to connect with the earth while cultivating resilience and well-being through the mindful practice of gardening. As you nurture plants and engage with the soil, you'll discover how the act of tending to nature can reduce stress, promote inner calm, and foster personal growth.This 90-minute experience is open to everyone, whether you’re a seasoned gardener or completely new to the practice. In a supportive and relaxing environment, you’ll learn how the simple, grounding process of gardening can help you reconnect with yourself and the world around you.Please wear comfortable, outdoor-appropriate clothing, as you’ll be engaging directly with the earth. All tools and materials will be provided. The session is gentle and can be adapted for all fitness levels, so you can participate at your own pace. If you have any health concerns or physical limitations, please inform the facilitator in advance, and adjustments will be made to ensure your comfort.While the experience is designed for all, please note that bookings are non-refundable and non-cancellable. Should you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out to us at info@zuva.life. We look forward to sharing this grounding journey with you, helping you grow both in the garden and within yourself.

name: Screening: Annie Hall (1977) | Movie Under the Stars
description: Join us for an open-air screening of Annie Hall (1977), with a three-course dinner and popcorn.*Wines and other beverages will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieAnnie Hall (1977) is a romantic comedy directed by and starring Woody Allen, alongside Diane Keaton. The film follows the neurotic comedian Alvy Singer (Allen) as he reflects on his relationship with the quirky, free-spirited Annie Hall (Keaton). Through a series of flashbacks, Alvy recounts the ups and downs of their romance, exploring themes of love, identity, and personal growth. The film’s non-linear narrative, breaking of the fourth wall, and witty dialogue set it apart, making it a landmark in modern romantic comedies. Annie Hall won four Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Actress for Keaton.3-Course Dinner MenuCourse 1Bell Pepper, Broccoli and Zucchini QuicheCourse 2Spaghetti and Meatballs (Chicken / Vegetarian)Served with garlic breadCourse 3﻿Devils food cake with red wine & cherries______Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

description: Courtyard's monthly playdate with The LooRoo Club is back!Join us at the yard to celebrate the magic of Diwali – The Festival of Lights!The morning will begin with a storytelling session of the interactive board book “Kahaani Puraani” by T4Tales. There will be Diyas and Diwali treats, nature lanterns and painting! Expect a burst of color, laughter, and play as we immerse your little ones in the joy and nostalgia of Diwali.Come be part of this vibrant celebration and let’s bring this cherished festival to life!Plus, the kids will take home a copy of the book as a special keepsake! For Kids aged 3- 6 years and their parentsTerms and ConditionsThe management bears no responsibility for any injury or damage incurred during the event.Purchase tickets exclusively from the designated ticketing platform.No refunds for no-shows or cancellations under any circumstances.Tickets are non-transferable and intended for personal use only.Event schedule and menu subject to change in case of emergencies or events beyond our control.The management will not entertain liability claims arising from the consumption of food or beverages.Parking near the event venue is at the vehicle owner's risk. name: Viva La Vino Wine Festival: Bangalore Edition
description: Viva La Vino - Bangalore EditionGet ready, Bangalore - The city’s most exciting wine, cheese, and chocolate festival is here! Co-curated by Sommeliers Gargi Kothari and Devati Mallick, Viva La Vino promises the best wines, great vibes, and unforgettable moments—no fuss, just pure fun. Experience an evening of tasting wines with old and new wine pals in a full-on festival setting! Whether you're new to wine or a seasoned pro, VLV will have you falling in love with the wine life all over again.What’s in store:60+ Wines from around the world! – Sip, swirl, and savour a curated lineup of Indian and international wines. Discover exciting new flavours from different corners of the world, scout for your new favourite wines, or revisit old classics with a twist. Taste & Buy – Loved a wine? We’ve got you covered! Get special prices on on-the-spot orders at the festival, which will be delivered later.Artisan Cheese & Chocolate – Heaven on a plate! Meet the makers behind some of the finest homegrown cheese and chocolate, perfect for pairing with the wines. Sample, chat, and take home your favourites at special prices.Exclusive Masterclass – 25 seats only! People who sign up for this will score access to a one-hour masterclass with industry experts, featuring premium wines not available at the festival (trust us, these are a must-try!)Music & Entertainment – A banging festival playlist to keep the vibes going all night while you sip, socialize, and explore!Live Food Stations – Indulge in mouthwatering bites at live stations curated by our venue partners—perfect for wine-ding down after all that serious tasting (phew!)!Wine Games & Trivia Zones – Ready for some fun? We’ve got interactive wine games that’ll test your wine knowledge and keep you entertained all evening. Whether you're into trivia, drinking games (wink wink!), or playful challenges, there’s something for everyone.Get your tickets now and join us for a wine-filled, fun-packed evening! Bring a friend, partner, a bunch of wine buddies or swing by on your own, but you can't miss this. #SeeyouatVLV?

location.address: Kumarakrupa Rd, opposite Golf Club, Kumara Park East, Seshadripuram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: Viva La Vino
organizer.description: Welcome to VLV – the ultimate wine festival! Co-curated by Sommeliers Gargi Kothari (Magic Cellars) and Devati Mallick (Drink With D), VLV travels across 6 cities, celebrating wine, culture, and community. Join us for the best wines, fun vibes, and unforgettable memories. See you at #VLV?

name: Pujo Platter
description: As our next pop-up, we bring to you The Pujo Platter by Madhumita PyneMadhumita is a food revivalist and specialises in heritage food from Bengal. You will get to savour her pujo feast with everyday specials of Durga Pujo.Join us for this special pop-up, that will showcase the different flavours and techniques of Bengali cuisine, from the uber-popular Kolkata street foods to little-known dishes originating in the kitchens of the Tagore family.On Ashtami and Navami, there's a special treat of Khichuri, Labra and bhaja for those missing Bhog.MENU: Welcome DrinkAam Pora SharbatStarterMochar chop (banana flower croquette)Karaishutir kachori - Alur dom (peas kachori with dum aloo)Chingrir chop (prawn croquetteFirst Plate (served with steamed rice)Chhanar paturi (banana leaf wrapped cottage cheese cooked in a coconut mustard paste)Bhetki paturi (banana leaf wrapped bhetki fish cooked in a coconut mustard paste)Second Plate (served with Bashanti Pulao)Chholar daler muthiya (chana dal dumpling curry)Kosha Mangsho (slow cooked mutton curry)Dessert Bhapa Doi (baked yogurt sweet)*Ashtami and Nanami we have optional Pandal Bhog for those missing out! (you can swap one of the mains for this)Bhoger KhichuriLabra5 types of Bhaja** Menu subject to slight changesTerms & Conditions:Please arrive punctually.Late arrivals may miss the first few courses.Booking Fee are non-refundable under all circumstances once booked. Tickets are transferrable to a third party.No shows/ cancellations will not be refunded, but you can reschedule your booking for within the week 48hrs before your slot is due.Alcohol will not be served to guests under the age of 21No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.The booking fee total includes the online transaction fee.Parking at the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet is available.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. Incase you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

location.address: 1, Palace Rd, Ambedkar Veedhi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: New India Lodge -1950. A Food Theatre Experience in Bangalore
description: Step into the Past, Dine in a Story: Join the Immersive Theatrical Feast! 🍽️ 🎭Experience "New India Lodge: Athithi Devo Bhava" - A Journey Beyond TimeWritten by Shubhra ChatterjiDirected by K V Divya RaniFood by The Nommers - Home Cuisine CollectiveProduced by paChaak ProductionsAre you ready for an unforgettable culinary voyage through the pages of history?Calling all Luru Foodies to an extraordinary event that will whisk you away to a bygone era and a tantalizing journey of flavors!🌐 Witness the Unseen, Dine with Our Characters: Your Personal Invitation to the 1940's 🌐Picture this: You step into a world where reality blurs with fiction, guests merge with actors, and your dinner is transformed into an enchanting theatrical adventure. Welcome to "New India Lodge: Athithi devo Bhava," an immersive play that takes you to Independence-era India.🚪 Enter the New India Lodge, a secret locationAs you cross the threshold, you'll be transported back to the 1940s. No longer just a guest, you'll become a character in this captivating narrative.🍽️ Taste the HistorySavor a meticulously curated meal, each dish representing a different region of India. The flavors of Gujarat, Kerala, Punjab, Karnataka, and more come together in a culinary symphony.🎭 Become Part of the StoryFrom the Bohri & Gujarati tradesman to the Malyali family to the Punjabi bride to the, every character has a tale to tell. Interact with them, uncover their secrets, and immerse yourself in their lives.🔮 Unveil Hidden NarrativesEngage in conversations, solve mysteries, and be a detective in a world of intrigue and charm. Who's a fellow guest, and who's a performer? Only time will reveal the truth.🎉 Brought to you by paChaak Productions, India's first Immersive Dining Experience curatorsThis exclusive event is an innovative collaboration between your love for food and your thirst for immersive experiences. Get ready to be delighted, engaged, and transported in ways you've never imagined!🎟️ Get Your Tickets NowSecure your spot at this one-of-a-kind event that combines history, drama, and culinary artistry. Limited seats available – don't miss your chance to be part of New India Lodge: Athithi Devo Bhava.📣 Join Us in Rewriting History Through a Magical Journey of Food and Stories! 📣InstructionsHeads up: Our secret location will be shared 24hrs prior to the showComfy shoes for the short walk, but once inside, it’s socks or barefoot to keep our vintage floors shining! 🧦✨

location.address: Cubbonpete, Nagarathpete, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560002, India

No longer just a guest, you'll become a character in this captivating narrative.🍽️ Taste the HistorySavor a meticulously curated meal, each dish representing a different region of India. The flavors of Gujarat, Kerala, Punjab, Karnataka, and more come together in a culinary symphony.🎭 Become Part of the StoryFrom the Bohri & Gujarati tradesman to the Malyali family to the Punjabi bride to the, every character has a tale to tell. Interact with them, uncover their secrets, and immerse yourself in their lives.🔮 Unveil Hidden NarrativesEngage in conversations, solve mysteries, and be a detective in a world of intrigue and charm. Who's a fellow guest, and who's a performer? Only time will reveal the truth.🎉 Brought to you by paChaak Productions, India's first Immersive Dining Experience curatorsThis exclusive event is an innovative collaboration between your love for food and your thirst for immersive experiences. Get ready to be delighted, engaged, and transported in ways you've never imagined!🎟️ Get Your Tickets NowSecure your spot at this one-of-a-kind event that combines history, drama, and culinary artistry. Limited seats available – don't miss your chance to be part of New India Lodge: Athithi Devo Bhava.📣 Join Us in Rewriting History Through a Magical Journey of Food and Stories! 📣InstructionsHeads up: Our secret location will be shared 24hrs prior to the showComfy shoes for the short walk, but once inside, it’s socks or barefoot to keep our vintage floors shining! 🧦✨

name: Food Nerd Festival - Immersives 2024 - Bangalore: Individual Passes
description: Food Nerd Festival is a celebration of all things food! So this festival is for anyone who’s obsessed with food! Whether you're a chef, foodie, flavour geek, or love to nerd out over the latest culinary trends and techniques, the Food Nerd Festival is your jam.With 4 workshops centred around the basic cooking elements, these immersives will leave you with an elevated culinary game.Salt by Chef Gautam & Bala (@gonzogarbanzo & @saltycuredpigs) (11-12:30)Guided Overview & History Of Preservation TechniquesExploring Techniques Of Pickling & Preserving In India & Around The WorldUnderstanding Curing Salts & The Science Behind ThemExpert Tips On Mastering Salt, Time, & FermentationLive Demonstration Of A Traditional Pickling TechniqueLive Demonstration Of A Meat Curing TechniqueRecipes For Pickling & Curing Bacon At HomeFat by Heena Punwani (@tiffintales, founder of Maska Bakery) (1:00-2:30)Cracking The Code Of Baking Theory: The Science Behind ItThe History Of Fats In CookingUnderstanding Different Fats In Indian BakingCookie Tasting Session Showcasing Different FatsOil Vs. Ghee: Flavor ShowdownLive Fat-Washing Cocktail DemoAcid by Payal Shah (@kobofermentery) (3:00-4:30)Exploring Indian Vinegars & Its Usage In Indian Cooking & HistoryLive Demonstration Of Vinegar Making.Breakdown Of The Science Behind The TechniqueA Vinegar-Tasting Experience of 5 vinegars.Hands-On Shrub-Based Drink MakingHeat by Chef Gresham Fernandes (@greshamfernandes) (5:00-6:30)Discover the Secrets of Heat SourcesUncover the chemistry behind how heat worksLearn the wonders of wood-fired cookingPro techniques for smoking foodUsing heat to create different textures: dry jerky vs fish roast. Disclaimer: Programming is subject to change, please watch out for an official email a few days before the actual workshop.

name: MF DOOM & friends: Halloween Edition
description: MF DOOM, the legendary British-American rapper and producer, is renowned for his intricate lyrics, unique flow, and mysterious persona. His influence on underground hip-hop is unparalleled, and his work continues to inspire fans and artists worldwide. On Sunday, October 27, from 6 PM onwards, On The Jungle Floor is hosting MF DOOM & friends (Halloween Edition) at Indiranagar Social, Bangalore to pay homage to DOOM—this time through the rich, immersive sound of vinyl.DOOM tragically passed away on Halloween 2020, making this tribute all the more poignant as we celebrate his life and legacy. Joining us are Sachin Bhatt (aka "bhattchin") and Maddwax, longtime followers and collectors of DOOM, who have spent years building enviable collections of his rarest records, sourced from around the world. Whether you’re a new listener or a long-time fan, we suggest you throw on your best costumes and join us for what will be an unforgettable night!

name: Breakfast & Bonding: A Turkish *Kahvaltı* Table with New Friends
description: Dive into the fun of a Turkish kahvaltı, where breakfast is more than just a meal—it's a social adventure! Picture yourself surrounded by fresh bread, juicy olives, creamy cheeses, and sweet jams, all shared with new friends around the table. Sip on cups of tea as you swap stories and laughter with strangers who soon feel like old pals. It’s the perfect way to break the ice, make connections, and enjoy some seriously delicious food together!
